reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: ARO/Partners? Capacity Building and partner meetings in the region

description.narrative: Capacity building support is needed by the implementing partners as well as FCA own staff in the field to be able to implement a quality programme. The capacity building will be carried out by providing financial and technical support to partners in order to enable them to enhance their skills as effective stakeholders of civil society and by offering capacity development of e.g. FCA?s own thematic focus areas and approach. FCA will build the capacity of staff and partners for example in the areas of DRR an d Emergency response, Education in Emergence (EIE), advocacy, peace building and conflict resolution, conflict sensitive programme management and other thematic areas.The overall objective is to improve effectiveness, quality and impact of programming by b uilding capacity of FCA and partner staff on thematic focus areas, cross cutting themes, PME and advocacy.Expected results: ? Capacity of FCA and partner staff have been built for effective and efficient programme implementation ? Regional and local traini ngs, workshops and exchange visits have been organised and facilitated
